amendment.description: Amendment requires States to make available to the general public their reports submitted to the Secretary of Education concerning their performances on vocational-technical education benchmarks.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 3 in the Congressional Record of July 16, 1996, to require states to make accountability reports, to the Education Secretary and made available to the public.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Klink amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
